body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Rebecca Goodwin Sizemore in Trigg County, Kentucky, on September 10, 1840. Father of William J. Sizemore, Daniel W. Sizemore, Nancy J. Sizemore, Ann E. Sizemore, Isabelle Sizemore, and Silas Sizemore. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.
